title: Upcycling of plastic waste to atomic nickel site-decorated carbon for efficient electrochemical CO2 conversion
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00244J, Paper
Lan-Hui Feng, Zhi-Hui Lv, Yi-Jie Kong, Xin-Ming Hu
We recycle solid plastic waste to valorize gaseous CO2 waste, demonstrating a sustainable strategy to address the environmental problems of plastic pollution and climate change simultaneously.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
